purpose: Facilitates automated phone call interactions using AI to enhance call center operations.
principle: Utilizes Python-based frameworks to handle API requests and manage telephony integrations for call automation.
reusability: Offers an API for seamless integration with existing call center platforms, allowing customization and extension.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited scalability and integration options, mainly supports specific telephony providers.
name: call-center-ai
description: Send a phone call from AI agent, in an API call. Or, directly call the bot from the configured phone number!
highlight: Enables AI-driven phone call interactions via API, integrating with existing call center systems.
